pageContext.claim: “The whole Russia thing was an excuse for the Democrats losing the election, and it turns out to be just one excuse.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump repeatedly claims the Russia investigation is made up, but the information on Russian efforts to sway the 2016 election was developed by the intelligence community and published in a declassified report, in which the agencies said they had "high confidence" it was correct. Whether or not there was collusion is still under investigation.
